title: Lunchbox’s Drive-Thru Trivia + Country Artist Upset With Bobby + Arby’s Bag Test
itunes:title: Lunchbox’s Drive-Thru Trivia + Country Artist Upset With Bobby + Arby’s Bag Test
description:
Lunchbox hit up drive-thru lanes to ask trivia questions to their employees. Bobby talked about why a certain country artist may be upset with him. Plus, we test out the internet challenge of an Arby’s bag holding 25 lbs. of food! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
